mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no AS cartNo, c.product_no AS productNo, c.member_id AS memberId, c.reg_date AS regDate, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_price AS productPrice, p.product_img AS productImg FROM tbl_cart c JOIN tbl_product p ON c.product_no = p.product_no WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId}
